Title: Makes it a class B felony to be a straw purchaser for firearms or to allow the use of your firearm in the commission of a class A or B felony
Summary: Makes it a class B felony to be a straw purchaser for firearms or to allow the use of your firearm in the commission of a class A or B felony.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to creating penalties for straw purchasers of firearms
